name: advanced-liquids
description:
This [violet]mod[white] adds a basic new item - a [cyan]universal liquid capsule[white].
It is possible to fill in any [red]standard[white] mindustry [cyan]liquid[white].
The idea is taken from the mod Indusrtial Craft 2 for minecraft.
